wash_label.drying_instructions: Do Not Tumble Dry, Hang Dry in Shade

care_label_instructions: The care label must contain carelabel symbols and those only.
Care label must be made in recycled polyester.
Care labels must contain origin: made in India.
Care labels must be given the same size, font and style.

other_standards.title: Standard 100 by Oekotex
other_standards.description: Label that ensures consumers that all materials used in a garment are tested for harmful substances.

other_standards.title: EU Ecolabel
other_standards.description: Label that ensures consumers that textiles are made using less harmful substances, energy and water.

other_standards.title: Bluesign
other_standards.description: The Bluesign System reduces impact on people and the environment in the entire textile supply chain, based on input stream management.
